sys_script_include.name: GetUserProperties

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_06e7dbec47e331107b748a5f746d431a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1178586_financ_0.GetUserProperties</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Get different user info.</description><name>GetUserProperties</name><script><![CDATA[var GetUserProperties = Class.create();
GetUserProperties.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getPhone: function() {
        var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        return grUser.getValue('phone');
    },
    getEmail: function() {
        var grUser = this.getParameter('sysparm_user');
        return grUser.getValue('email');
    },
    getLocation: function() {
        var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');

        if (grUser.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_user'))) {
            return grUser.getValue('location');
        }
    },
    type: 'GetUserProperties'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-02 12:59:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>06e7dbec47e331107b748a5f746d431a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserProperties</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_06e7dbec47e331107b748a5f746d431a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-02 13:30:52</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
